# Results

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
w <- read_csv(file = "ftp://ftp.hafro.is/pub/data/csv/minke.csv")
ggplot(w, aes(age, length, colour = sex)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth() +
  labs(x = "Age [year]",
       y = "Length [cm]",
       colour = "Sex",
       title = "Minke whale",
       subtitle = "Age and length by sex",
       caption = "Data from Iceland") +
  scale_colour_brewer(palette = "Set1")
```
